attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In view of the recent news story that a young girl was rejected from a fee paying Environment Agency position because she was 'too English' we the undersigned require the Prime Minister to investigate said event and should it be found to have any grounds whatsoever, end this trend toward 'positive discrimination' within government agencies. 'Positive Discrimination' is automatically negative towards someone, in this case against the majority of people in this country by precluding them on purely racial grounds. This is hardly democratic. We would also like to point out that we'd like our taxes to be spent as productively as possible. Precluding suitable candidates on racial grounds is not doing this.
